description: bowl with foot ring; black exterior; white interior with low relief design highlighted in black with green touches; bullfight scene with matador with spear on horseback at left, facing bull; sun in sky at top center; arena arches and dots representing spectators at top; silhouettes of upper bodies of spectators at bottom

title: Bullfight
